entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is a student who is trying to get back to the dormitories with his friend Ron Weasley.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is trying to get out of the corridor and is shouting at Harry.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is an elf who is attempting to harm himself and is being stopped by Harry.

relationships.description: Hermione is shouting at Harry from the center of the knot of people.
Harry scooped up Dobby and ran with him to join the back of the queue.
Harry orders Dobby to get back down to the kitchen with the other elves.
